dataClass
Class ProgramCore

java.lang.Object
  dataClass.ProgramCore
All Implemented Interfaces:
Core
public class ProgramCore
extends java.lang.Object
implements Core

Author:
Niels Thykier This is our main class and links all the classes together. The ProgramCore will start everything at Construction.

Constructor Detail

ProgramCore

public ProgramCore(java.lang.String[] cmdLineArgs)
            throws java.lang.Exception
This will init the other classes and have the UI start its interaction. There can only be contructed one ProgramCore. Attempts to construct a second will cause the constructor to throw an exception. This constructor will catch all possible Runtime Exceptions and any such will cause it to do System.exit(1); If no Runtime Exception is thrown, the Constructor will call System.exit(0);

Parameters:
cmdLineArgs - the Commandline arguments (if any)
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
java.lang.Exception - If a ProgramCore has already been started.

loadStudyPlan

public StudyPlan loadStudyPlan(java.lang.String studentID)
                        throws FilePermissionException,
                               java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                               java.io.IOException,
                               CorruptStudyPlanFileException
Description copied from interface: Core
Load a saved StudyPlan

Specified by:
loadStudyPlan in interface Core
Parameters:
studentID - the unique Identifier of the of the StudyPlan (or the filename of it without a .plan extension)
Returns:
the StudyPlan.
Throws:
FilePermissionException - Thrown if required File Permissions for the file was missing.
java.io.FileNotFoundException - Thrown if no file could be found (determined from the studentID).
java.io.IOException - If internal read errors happened.
CorruptStudyPlanFileException - Thrown if the file could be found, but the data was not understandable.

addCourseToStudyPlan

public void addCourseToStudyPlan(java.lang.String studentID,
                                 java.lang.String courseID,
                                 int semester)
                          throws ConflictingCourseInStudyPlanException,
                                 CourseDoesNotExistException,
                                 CritalCourseDataMissingException,
                                 java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                 StudyPlanDoesNotExistException,
                                 CourseAlreadyExistsException
Specified by:
addCourseToStudyPlan in interface Core
Parameters:
studentID - the student ID of the student, who's plan it should be added to.
courseID - The ID of the course to be added.
semester - The semester the course should be added too.
Throws:
ConflictingCourseInStudyPlanException - Thrown if the course to be added have at least one matching skema data with a course on the same semester as the course to be added.
CourseDoesNotExistException - Thrown if no course had that course ID.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if semester is less than 0 or greater than 20
StudyPlanDoesNotExistException - Thrown if the StudyPlan related to studentID does not exist.
CourseAlreadyExistsException - Thrown if the course is already in the StudyPlan.
CritalCourseDataMissingException
See Also:
Core.addCourseToStudyPlan(java.lang.String, dataClass.SelectedCourse)
